about_the_game:
The Story:

From a young age, you've known you were different. You're not sure when your attraction to other boys started, but you knew it wasn't normal, or rather, society taught you it wasn't. After years of termoil, you decide the time to come out is now! Having recently turned 18, you spent a few days plotting out how to do it, what to say, and how to react to any response you may get. However, after coming out to a certain someone, your life takes a turn you couldn't have possibly planned for, and now, your journey to become the femboy you've always wanted to be begins.

Developer Notes:

Hello, and thank you for checking out my store page. I just want to say that The Awakening: Femboy Saga is my first game and is the first of many more to come. If you decide to play, you'll notice that the main character isn't an actual femboy in the game, at least not yet. His journey to become a femboy will play out over many games, and the story will continue game by game.

I would also like to say that I only develop small games since I don't have the time to put into a larger format game. If you're not a fan of smaller format games, then The Awakening: Femboy Saga and any future games aren't for you. Thank you.

Gameplay:

The game is a kinetic visual novel, so you'll follow a single story.

Features:

As I said above, the game is rather small and consists of:

  • 977 lines of code
  • 102 images
  • 12 animations
  • Full audio track
  • Game achievements

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains images and descriptive sex of an adult nature. Included but not limited to full sex scenes between two adult males. Please only play if you are 18+ ( or however old your country deems an adult to be. ) All characters within the game are 18+ years of age. The game also depicts the use of alcohol and possible borderline, nonconsensual sex between two adult males, light crossdressing and has scenes that show milds forms of BDSM such as a submission/domination relationship.

detailed_description:
The Story:

From a young age, you've known you were different. You're not sure when your attraction to other boys started, but you knew it wasn't normal, or rather, society taught you it wasn't. After years of termoil, you decide the time to come out is now! Having recently turned 18, you spent a few days plotting out how to do it, what to say, and how to react to any response you may get. However, after coming out to a certain someone, your life takes a turn you couldn't have possibly planned for, and now, your journey to become the femboy you've always wanted to be begins.

Developer Notes:

Hello, and thank you for checking out my store page. I just want to say that The Awakening: Femboy Saga is my first game and is the first of many more to come. If you decide to play, you'll notice that the main character isn't an actual femboy in the game, at least not yet. His journey to become a femboy will play out over many games, and the story will continue game by game.

I would also like to say that I only develop small games since I don't have the time to put into a larger format game. If you're not a fan of smaller format games, then The Awakening: Femboy Saga and any future games aren't for you. Thank you.

The game is a kinetic visual novel, so you'll follow a single story.

Features:

As I said above, the game is rather small and consists of:

  • 977 lines of code
  • 102 images
  • 12 animations
  • Full audio track
  • Game achievements
legal_notice: The game is a work of fiction, and anything that resembles real people, places, or scenarios is a coincidence. All characters depicted are 18+.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 or better, AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: The Awakening - Femboy Saga

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD A4-4000
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 , DirectX 9 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD A4-4000
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 , DirectX 9 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: All your life, you've felt different. You noticed your attraction to other boys at a young age, and now, having turned 18, your journey begins to awaken the femboy you know you're destined to be.
